content:
Hi all!

tl;dr: please fill out the Cats4AI feedback form: https://forms.gle/gRpv1t9Xi6zzpyCB7

As mentioned in previous thread(s): on behalf of the entire organising team of Cats4AI :cat: , I'd like to thank you all for actively engaging with the course so far! :tada:

With the core set of five lectures now finished, we thought it would be a good idea to collect any feedback you might have.

If you have some time, please help us by filling in the feedback form given above. This information will prove invaluable to us as we consolidate the material, and consider delivering it again in future years. Please be as detailed as you would like!

Looking forward to catching up with you all soon---our second guest lecture is next week (on Monday, in the usual slot)!
